alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 4:34PM CST until January 01 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... Western Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 500 PM CST. * At 434 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tishomingo State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Underwood-Petersville, Malone, Posey Loop, Mt Hester, Maud and Allsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
